Question.Subject: can i search a phone number on the internet and get the address?
Question.Content: ive been gettin a prank call from this same number 4 ages and ive been searchin 4 the address 2 go with it but i cnt find it plz help the number is 01843 851555 ring it and anoy them or help me find the address
Question.ChosenAnswer: Yes you can. Visit this this site and as soon as you do click on the link that says 'Search by Phone"

Answer.Content: Yes you can. Visit this this site and as soon as you do click on the link that says 'Search by Phone"

Thats not a real phone number. I don't doubt thats what's showing up on your ID, but in order to use 'Reverse Look Ups' you have to have a actual phone number
Area code plus number;
Example:
(000) 555 8888
Atleast in America - And thats where we Are!!!
